DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess safety immunogenicity GSK Biologicals ' investigational vaccine GSK2321138A adults 18 year old old . This study also design assess lot-to-lot consistency vaccine GSK2321138A . The blind double blind group except GSK2604409A Group open .
